Description: Ensure all passwords meet complexity requirements
All privileged accounts must be rotated every 90 days
Users must have minimum necessary privileges
Critical functions must be divided among different individuals
Privileged access must be reviewed quarterly
Inactive accounts must be disabled after 60 days
Shared accounts must be limited and documented
Emergency access must follow break-glass procedure
All access must be recertified every 90 days
Administrator accounts must follow security guidelines
Remote access must use multi-factor authentication
All privileged actions must be logged and monitored
Must prevent reuse of previous 10 passwords
Accounts must lock after 5 failed attempts
Service accounts must be managed and restricted
Cloud credentials must be secured and rotated
Third-party access must be limited and monitored
Database administrative access must be restricted
Network device access must be authenticated and encrypted
Temporary access must expire automatically
